body_html:
@wzpan Thanks for filing this issue!

It looks like the "native pip" section on both linux and mac suffers from this documentation issue. Also note that the linux instructions incorrectly reference "your Mac".
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#install_tensorflow
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac#install_tensorflow

Assigning to @martinwicke , feel free to re-assign as appropriate. Thanks!

body:
@wzpan Thanks for filing this issue!

It looks like the "native pip" section on both linux and mac suffers from this documentation issue.  Also note that the linux instructions incorrectly reference "your Mac".
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#install_tensorflow
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac#install_tensorflow

Assigning to @martinwicke , feel free to re-assign as appropriate.  Thanks!
